GSD.description:
MIPS: fix fortify panic when copying asm exception handlers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit fc283677599b5b13e5e2734abb8829adb8c02ce1. For more details please see the references link.
